name: Hibernated 1: Director's Cut
overview: An Infocom style interactive text adventure by Stefan Vogt. It's a complete rewrite of Hibernated 1 using Infocom's Z-machine standard, with additional narrative content and riddles. It was published for download by Puddle Software and released in a physical box by poly.play. Have you ever dreamed about a journey far beyond the known regions of the universe? Close to Alpha Centauri, Olivia Lund is on the trail of one of mankind's greatest secrets and a thousand-year-old mystery. After nearly 20 years in hypersleep, she wakes up alone on her stranded ship, the Polaris-7. The artificial intelligence Io seems to be her only remaining friend now.
